medical_history.chief_complaint: Difficulty in running and progressive difficulty in walking.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began at age 6 with difficulty in running, and progressively worsened. The patient became wheelchair-bound by age 20 with urinary incontinence and constipation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of difficulty in running and complaints of pain in the back and legs thought to be due to arthralgia. Diagnosed with HAM/TSP at age 11.
